name: Al Mu'eed
description: Al Mu'eed is one of the names of Allah in Islam. It means 'The Restorer' or 'The Reinstater'.
summary: The origin of the name Al Mu'eed comes from the Arabic root word 'ع و د' (ʿ-w-d), which signifies the act of returning or bringing back. In Islamic belief, this name emphasizes Allah's attribute of restoring creation and granting second chances, whether in terms of guidance, forgiveness, or the revival of life after death.
